ref: 4694 carcarī f. ʻ a partic. kind of song ʼ Kālid.
Pk. caccarī -- f. ʻ a band of singers, a kind of song ʼ;
B. cã̄car ʻ lighting bonfires on the eve of the Dol festival ʼ;
Or. cācerī ʻ merrymaking on the eve of the Dol festival ʼ;
H. cācar, cã̄c˚ f. ʻ singing and dancing round a pole at the Holī festival ʼ.
